entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:12 a.m. MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -11.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 3:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -11.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 2 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -13.8°C
Wind: E 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times late this evening and overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Blowing snow at times early in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
